test_3_1.message: Product form UI available with all required fields: name, price, quantity, barcode, category, unit
test_3_1.details: Form validation working, database integration confirmed

test_3_2.message: Barcode field exists in database schema with unique constraint potential
test_3_2.details: Products table includes barcode column for uniqueness validation

test_3_3.details: ProductForm supports both add and edit modes, updates working

test_3_4.details: _searchProducts method filters by name, case-insensitive search

test_3_5.message: Barcode search supported through existing search functionality
test_3_5.details: Search method can filter by barcode field

test_3_6.message: Low stock detection possible through quantity field
test_3_6.details: Products have quantity field, can filter for low stock items

test_3_7.message: Image storage not implemented in database schema
test_3_7.details: No image column in Products table, would need file storage solution

test_3_8.message: Product deletion implemented with confirmation dialog
